      • setTextArea

        public static void setTextArea​(java.lang.String message)
        Sets the content of the mesage area. Adds message to the end of it. Not overwrite enabled. It is called by ServerListennerThread when receiving a message.
        Parameters:
        message -

      • sendMessage

        public static void sendMessage()
        Sends the message that the user typed on the text field. It is called by all action listenners.

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Waits for the client to send messages and then sends them to the server. It runs ServerListennerThread too.
